name: mbox to pst
short_description: MBOX to PST is an expedient tool that helps you convert MBOX files to MS Outlook PST files with complete accuracy. It provides you with one stop solution to perform successful conversion of MBOX files created in Apple Mail, Entourage, PowerMail or Thunderbird into Outlook importable PST file. Using this software you just don't have to worry about whether the files have been created with Postbox, Netscape, PocoMail, Eudora, Spicebird and Opera Email client. The utility is devised in such a manner that you can convert MBOX files into Outlook PST file in almost every situation Adding to that, you can easily add as many files as required all-at-once.For more information http://mboxtopst-tools.blogspot.in/
